description: A service for configuring how Jacdac device map to HID input events. Users can have multiple configurations and swap between them by writing to `current_configuration`.

contents.name: num_configurations
contents.description: The number of configurations stored on the server.

contents.name: current_configuration
contents.description: The current configuration the server is using.

contents.name: changed
contents.description: Event that notifies clients that the server has swapped to a new configuration or changed key bindings.
